question: The World Theatre Day (WTD) is observed on which date?
explanation: The World Theatre Day (WTD) is observed every year on March 27 to draw attention to the power of the stage. The day was initiated  in 1961  by the International Theatre Institute (ITI), the world organization for performing arts. The day is a celebration for those who can see the value and importance of the art form “theatre”, and acts as a wake-up-call for governments, politicians and institutions which have not yet recognized its value to the people and to the individual and have not yet realized its potential for economic growth.
